original_text: And she bare him a son, and he called his name Gershom: for he said, I have been a stranger in a strange land.
korean_text: 그가 아들을 낳으매 모세가 그의 이름을 게르솜이라 하여 이르되 내가 타국에서 나그네가 되었음이라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: And she bare him a son
and he called his name Gershom
I have been a stranger in a strange land
